TEXT.S: Serbia hya' ga cyux maki' tay 44 00 N, 21 00 E na Oco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 77,474 sq km (maki' tay 117 ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 77,474 sq km, kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 0 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 7,143,921. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 57.90 , lhlahuy hya' ga 31.60 , sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 10.50 . spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Belgrade. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 15 na tay sazing byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Tomislav Nikoli , aring ryax 31 squ byacing tay 5 sa kawas 2012 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la.
